title: Modules, Packages & pip
content:
Modules are .py files you import. Packages are folders with __init__.py. The Python Package Index (PyPI) hosts third-party packages; install with pip.

Best practice: create virtual environments (venv) per project.
codeExample:
import math
print(math.sqrt(25))

# third-party example (install first):
# pip install requests
# import requests
